subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: After the reliable Angels made three errors and another startling miscue in a 4-1 loss to the Yankees in the opener of the A.L.C.S., Manager Mike Scioscia gave his team a pep talk.
snippet: After the reliable Angels made three errors and another startling miscue in a 4-1 loss to the Yankees in the opener of the A.L.C.S., Manager Mike Scioscia gave his team a pep talk.
